newsitem.title: USA: Northstar Computer FY96 operating net up.
newsitem.headline: Northstar Computer FY96 operating net up.

text.p: Northstar Computer Forms Inc said its operating income for fiscal 1996, ended October 31, increased 24.8 percent over the same year-ago period.
However, it said net income declined 7.4 percent to $1.3 million from $1.4 million because of a $300,000 gain on the sale of land in 1995.
Northstar designs and manufactures business and financial forms.
